context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. COVID-19 initially devastated bookings, then recovered with domestic travel and longer stays.

competitors.name: Vrbo (Expedia)
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform focused on family travel and whole homes

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: OTA with massive vacation rental inventory competing globally

competitors.name: Marriott Homes & Villas
competitors.notes: Hotel chain's premium home rental offering

competitors.name: Vacasa
competitors.notes: Vacation rental management company with large inventory

competitors.name: Hotels
competitors.notes: Traditional hotels adapting with enhanced cleaning protocols

competitors.name: Getaway
competitors.notes: Cabin rental company for nature escapes
